title: Gangs of Wasseypur: Part 1
writer: Akhilesh Jaiswal, Anurag Kashyap, Sachin K. Ladia
short_cast: Manoj Bajpayee, Nawazuddin Siddiqui, Huma Qureshi, Satyakam Anand, Piyush Mishra, Jameel Khan, Jaideep Ahlawat, Richa Chadda, Reema Sen, Tigmanshu Dhulia
